summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Task Manager application. All CRUD operations, frontend functionality, and backend-frontend integration working perfectly. 100% test success rate across all features.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility
design_issues.impact: Accessibility warning only, no functional impact

passed_tests: Backend API - Create task with all fields (title, description, status, deadline)
Backend API - Get single task by ID
Frontend - Page load and initial state
Frontend - Task creation dialog and form submission
Frontend - Task display in cards with proper information
Frontend - Multiple tasks with different statuses
